trans-unit.source: Represents a selectable <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> that can contain text and images.
Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> to create a toolbar button that supports both text and images.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> para criar um botão de barra de ferramentas que oferece suporte a texto e imagens.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextAlign%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties to get or set the positioning of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> images and text.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextAlign%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedades para obter ou definir o posicionamento de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> imagens e texto.

trans-unit.source: You can display a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> with various border styles, and you can use it to represent and activate operational states.
trans-unit.target: Você pode exibir um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> com borda vários estilos e você pode usá-lo para representar e ativar os estados operacionais.

trans-unit.source: You can also define it to have the focus by default.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode defini-lo para ter o foco por padrão.

trans-unit.source: Although <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> replaces and extends the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> control of previous versions, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use.
trans-unit.target: Embora <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> substitui e estende o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> controle de versões anteriores, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> é mantido para compatibilidade com versões anteriores e o uso futuro.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> controls with both image and text on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra duas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> controles com o texto e imagens em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.

trans-unit.source: Clicking the **New**<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> displays a message box.
trans-unit.target: Clique o **novo** <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> exibe uma caixa de mensagem.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> class.
The image to display on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> class that displays the specified image.
Use this constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> that displays only an image on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> que exibe apenas uma imagem no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> class that displays the specified text.
Use this constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> that displays only text on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> que exibe apenas o texto no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" />.
The image to display on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> class that displays the specified text and image.
Use this constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> that displays both an image and text.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> que exibe uma imagem e o texto.

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" />.
The image to display on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" />.
An event handler that raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click" /> event.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> class that displays the specified text and image and that raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click" /> event.
Use this constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> that displays both an image and text and raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click> event when clicked.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> que exibe uma imagem e texto e gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click> evento quando clicado.

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" />.
The image to display on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" />.
An event handler that raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click" /> event.
The name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" />.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> class with the specified name that displays the specified text and image and that raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click" /> event.

Use this constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> with the specified name that displays both an image and text and raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click> event when clicked.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> com o nome especificado que exibe uma imagem e texto e gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click> evento quando clicado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether default or custom <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> text is displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" />.
<see langword="true" /> if default <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> text is displayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o texto padrão <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> for exibido; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.AutoToolTip%2A> property to `false` to display custom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ToolTipText%2A> on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.AutoToolTip%2A> propriedade `false` exibir personalizado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ToolTipText%2A> em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example turns off the automatic <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> text for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> and sets custom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ToolTipText%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir desativa o automático <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> texto para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> e define personalizado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ToolTipText%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> can be selected.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> can be selected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> pode ser selecionado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> is pressed or not pressed.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> is pressed in or not pressed in; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> está pressionado ou não pressionado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckOnClick%2A> property to `true` and uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.Checked%2A> property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckedChanged> event to change the font of the button text to bold when the button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckOnClick%2A> propriedade `true` e usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.Checked%2A> propriedade em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckedChanged> evento para alterar a fonte do texto do botão como negrito quando o botão é clicado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.Checked" /> property changes.
For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckOnClick%2A> property to `true` and uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.Checked%2A> property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckedChanged> event to change the font of the button text to bold when the button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckOnClick%2A> propriedade `true` e usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.Checked%2A> propriedade em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckedChanged> evento para alterar a fonte do texto do botão como negrito quando o botão é clicado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> should automatically appear pressed in and not pressed in when clicked.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> should automatically appear pressed in and not pressed in when clicked; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> devem aparecer pressionado automaticamente e não pressionado quando clicado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckOnClick%2A> property to `true` and uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.Checked%2A> property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckedChanged> event to change the font of the button text to bold when the button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckOnClick%2A> propriedade `true` e usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.Checked%2A> propriedade em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckedChanged> evento para alterar a fonte do texto do botão como negrito quando o botão é clicado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> is in the pressed or not pressed state by default, or is in an indeterminate state.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="Unchecked" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="Unchecked" />.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckState%2A> to `Indeterminate` when you do not want to set a default state.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckState%2A> para `Indeterminate` quando você não deseja definir um estado padrão.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState" /> values.
Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckState" /> property changes.
For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckStateChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckStateChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este relatório ajuda você a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Para gerar relatórios sobre vários eventos ou eventos que ocorrem com frequência, considere substituir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> com <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou anexar a mensagem como um multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> named `ToolStripButton1`.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> chamado `ToolStripButton1`.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckStateChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckStateChanged> evento.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" />.
A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" />.

If you do not explicitly call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Se você não chama explicitamente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>, ele será chamado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibilityObject%2A> propriedade é referenciada.

trans-unit.source: To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibilityObject%2A> property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Para obter ou definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibilityObject%2A> propriedade, você deve adicionar uma referência para o `Accessibility` assembly instalado com o .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether to display the ToolTip that is defined as the default.
<see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: The specified area for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" />.
Retrieves the size of a rectangular area into which a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton" /> can be fitted.
An ordered pair of type <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> representing the width and height of a rectangle.
An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckedChanged" /> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnCheckedChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnCheckedChanged%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnCheckedChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnCheckedChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnCheckedChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnCheckedChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.CheckStateChanged" /> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnCheckStateChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnCheckStateChanged%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnCheckStateChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnCheckStateChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnCheckStateChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnCheckStateChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click" /> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnClick%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnClick%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnClick(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnClick(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnClick(System.EventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnClick(System.EventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint" /> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnPaint%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnPaint%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.
